VIKI documentation home¶

This is the VIKI robotics framework documentation. It is split up in three parts:

  1. User’s documentation which includes Installation and Quick start guide
  2. Contributor’s documentation which includes Module writing guide
  3. Developer’s guide Which includes for instance API documentation and System Overview
